name: SpanningClass
short_description:
This project implements a prototype compiler for research into the "supervenience" construct for the next release of core java. A simple "spanning class" enhancement to core Java allows you to insert a class or interface that acts as super to one or more existing classes without changing them. The consistency, and utility of this feature has been studied over several years. Results and explanation is available in several peer-reviewed research papers already published.

This project is an opportunity for researchers and students to work on a project. Either theory, design, or code-and-test can be contributed. Collaboration on upcoming papers or submitting a new JSR is possible
summary: Java 9 feature: super classifier out-of-hierarchy, proposed
